name: overloaded (Maksimy4)
description:
Robot sorting poxes in wharehouse. Try to maintain it charged, but not overloaded to not loose control. The game was created for 7th Scrach Game Jam and fully made in Scratch.

v1.1 - Now it is a bit easier to play and you can get some extra movement if you drop the box. The lighter you are the easier it is to move :)
